items.title: Treasury to cover Bayeux Tapestry for estimated Â£800m
items.description: The huge embroidery will be covered under the government's indemnity scheme when it travels to the UK.

items.title: Family cremates wrong body after hospital mistake
items.description: The Queen Elizabeth University Hospital in Glasgow has apologised and launched an investigation.

items.title: Poland scrambles jets as Russia strikes Kyiv before US-Ukraine peace talks
items.description: Poland's military says its air force took a "preventative" response to secure its airspace.

items.title: 'MCG pitch would get hell if produced elsewhere'
items.description: Captain Ben Stokes says there would be "hell on" if the Melbourne pitch upon which his England team beat Australia inside two days had been produced i...

items.title: Thailand and Cambodia agree ceasefire after weeks of deadly clashes
items.description: Almost one million people have been displaced since hostilities resumed earlier this month.
